text: ® Our theory about the origin and causes of psychological problems will determine what we think is the best way to treat those problems ® Psychotherapy is one way, but is a cultural product and we need to keep this in mind ® Other cultures have different enthnopsychologies about the causes of psychological distress and so they may have different methods of healing ® Whether we view a particular mental health problem as a symptom of: ® Individual malfunctioning « thoughts, behaviors, emotions ® Loss of culture and historical trauma v\ ® Biological illness \% ® Or a combination of factors will determine what kind of > healing we favor
